items.sentence: Mary worked as a babysitter when she was a teenager.
I\'d do it myself, but I\'m a little busy right now.
Tom died after stepping on a scorpion in the desert.
Tom died just one day after his seventieth birthday.
Tom does 100 sit-ups every morning before breakfast.
Tom always goes to the supermarket where Mary works.
Tom always makes fun of John because of his dialect.
Tom and I made ourselves as comfortable as possible.
Tom and I made ourselves as comfortable as we could.
Tom and Mary almost always play tennis after school.
